Date: Saturday, 6/14/1989
Subject: Jacob Brumfield
Jacob Brumfield is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,

Date: Saturday, 7/5/1989
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Mike A. Anderson



Date: Tuesday, 7/8/1989
Subject: Progress of Brian Barnes
Dear Sir,
Brian Barnes is doing pretty good at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 3.93, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 7/9/1989
Subject: Jeff Musselman healing process
Jeff Musselman is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 7/14/1989
Subject: Progress of Jerome Walton
Dear Sir,
Jerome Walton has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an AVG of .276 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
